content: Hi folks. I'm new to Rust. Building a cryptography library. Looking for the right error handling pattern. Found this zulip via #project-error-handling . It seems there's contention on how best to handle errors in Rust. I found this article interesting https://sled.rs/errors . Would someone be so kind as to refer me to the state-of-the-art on error handling patterns? Thank you.
Thanks. I'll go there next. I thought I'd keep my newb foolishness to the new members stream at first.
